section.title: JSFUnit
section.para:
The JSFUnit integration to Arquillian is a simpler way of using JSFUnit.
You no longer need to manually post processor your WebArchives with JSFUnit dependecies
You can easly test single pages
Both in-contianer and client mode support
Use JUnit 4.8.1 or TestNG 5.12.1

warning.para: JSFUnit integration requires a Java EE 6 compliant server. The packaging is based on web-fragments from Servlet 3.0.

sect2.title: Code example
Maven setup example
sect2.para: The only dependencies needed is to add org.jboss.arquillian.framework:arquillian-framework-jsfunit and org.jboss.jsfunit:jboss-jsfunit-core to your pom.xml. The rest is handled by Arquillian in the background. Take a look at the to see how you set up arquillian using maven.

warning.para: To use JSFUnit with Arquillian, JSFUnit 1.3.0.Final is required.
